trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents a numeric value between - 10^38 +1 and 10^38 - 1, with fixed precision and scale.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx $ 00$00 $0 xxx 00$00 $ 0$ xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of decimal places to which the Value property is resolved.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of digits in the adjusted structure.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

If this parameter is true, the new Value will be rounded, if false, the value will be truncated.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxx xxx Xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
A signed number that indicates the relative values of the instance and the object.

Return value

Condition

Less than zero

This instance is less than the object.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$Xxxxxx xxxxx $$x$$x$x$Xxxxxxxxx $$x$$x$xxxxx$$xxxxx$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxxx xxxx xxxx $$x$$x$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Zero

This instance is the same as the object.
trans-unit.target: $$x$$x$$xx$$$xx$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxxx $$x$$x$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Greater than zero

This instance is greater than the object

-or-

The object is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: $$x$$x$$xx$$$xx$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx $$x$$x$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx $$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx $$xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx Xxxxxx Xxxxx$ $$x$$x$$xx$$$xx$$$xxxxx$$$xxxxx$$x

trans-unit.source:
A signed number that indicates the relative values of the instance and the object.

Return Value

Condition

Less than zero

This instance is less than the object.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$Xxxxxx Xxxxx $$x$$x$x$Xxxxxxxxx $$x$$x$xxxxx$$xxxxx$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxxx xxxx xxxx $$x$$x$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Zero

This instance is the same as the object.
trans-unit.target: $$x$$x$$xx$$$xx$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxxx $$x$$x$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Greater than zero

This instance is greater than the object

-or-

The object is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: $$x$$x$$xx$$$xx$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx $$x$$x$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx $$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx $$xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx Xxxxxx Xxxxx$ $$x$$x$$xx$$$xx$$$xxxxx$$$xxxxx$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue if the two values are equal.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: Xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
If either instance is null, the value of the SqlDecimal will be null.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxx$ xxx xxxxx xx xxx $xxxxxx$XxxXxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the hash code for this instance.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X 00$xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The String to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

A double value that indicates the power to which the number should be raised.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of significant fractional digits (precision) in the return value.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx $xxxxxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The decimal position to which the number will be truncated.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Supply a negative value for the position parameter in order to truncate the value to the corresponding position to the left of the decimal point.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxx $xx$xxxxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x
